BCEL API documentation

Packages
de.fub.bytecode This package contains basic classes for the Byte Code Engineering Library and constants defined by the JVM specification.
de.fub.bytecode.classfile This package contains the classes that describe the structure of a Java class file and a class file parser.
de.fub.bytecode.generic This package contains the "generic" part of the Byte Code Engineering Library, i.e., classes to dynamically modify class objects and byte code instructions.
de.fub.bytecode.util This package contains utility classes for the Byte Code Engineering Library, namely collection classes for JavaClass objects and a converter for class files to HTML.
